subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As the season winds down, the Giants want to hitch their chances to the broad-shouldered Brandon Jacobs. But they need assurances that he will be healthy and that he will hold on to the ball.
snippet: As the season winds down, the Giants want to hitch their chances to the broad-shouldered Brandon Jacobs. But they need assurances that he will be healthy and that he will hold on to the ball.
